thread.title: Ground News - Why a Toronto-born rugby star loves delivering beer to pubs around England
thread.title_full: Ground News - Why a Toronto-born rugby star loves delivering beer to pubs around England

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Why a Toronto-born rugby star loves delivering beer to pubs around England
text:
Summary by Ground News Toronto-born rugby star Chantelle Crowl has represented both England and Canada in international rugby. She was included in a roundup of women who have made the shift from other careers to driving 44-tonne Heavy Goods Vehicles (HGVs) in Great Britain. Only one per cent of HGV drivers in Britain are women. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
National Post Lean Right High Factuality Individual: Leon Cooperman Corporation: Allianz Why a Toronto-born rugby star loves delivering beer to pubs around England Only one per cent of Heavy Goods Vehicles drivers in Britain are women but rugby star Chantelle Crowl is working to change that
